vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 34, “Personnel Rules” of the Dallas City Code amending Section 34-4 and adding new Sections 34-22.2 through 34-22.4, and 34-24.2 (1) amending the definitions; (2) adding provisions for quarantine leave, (3) mental health leave for peace officers, (4) compassionate leave; (5) paid parental leave; (6) providing a saving clause; (7) providing a severability clause; and (8) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 34, “Personnel Rules” of the Dallas City Code amending Section 34-4 and adding new Sections 34-22.2 through 34-22.4, and 34-24.2 (1) amending the definitions; (2) adding provisions for quarantine leave, (3) mental health leave for peace officers, (4) compassionate leave; (5) paid parental leave; (6) providing a saving clause; (7) providing a severability clause; and (8) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
